title: Erosion

description: This film relates the story of man-made erosion, showing what it has done to the earth's productive lands. Sheet and gully erosion by water and sheet erosion by wind and their destructive effects are graphically illustrated. Conservation farming methods can overcome both man-made and natural erosion.
